msg:
Error code: 10000, 10020, 10021 - The mobile device is not connected to the network
Make sure both your mobile device and home Wi-Fi can access the Internet.

Error code: 10006, 10011 - Network connection timed out
Make sure both your mobile device and home Wi-Fi can access the Internet.

Unable to connect the robot to the network -【10010】、【10018】、【10025】:
  • Make sure the connected home Wi-Fi network is a 2.4GHz or 2.4/5GHz mixed network.
  • Make sure that the robot is in an area with good Wi-Fi coverage. We recommend using the robot within 3 meters of the scope of your home Wi-Fi.
  • Please confirm that the robot is turned on and in the network configuration standby mode.
  • Make sure that the home Wi-Fi password you've entered is correct.
  • Make sure that the home Wi-Fi connected to the mobile device is the same as that connected to the robot.

Error code: 10006, 10011 - Network connection timed out
Make sure both your mobile device and home Wi-Fi can access the Internet.

Error code: 10016, 10017 - Device configuration timed out
Make sure the phone's mobile data, such as its 4G network, is turned off.
Make sure your phone is connected to the Robot Wi-Fi.
If you cannot see the "ECOVACS_xxxx" Wi-Fi, reboot Robot (press and hold the Reset button until a startup sound is played) and the router; then force quit the app and try again

Error code: 10016, 10017 - Device configuration timed out
Make sure the phone's mobile data, such as its 4G network, is turned off.
Make sure your phone is connected to the Robot Wi-Fi.
If you cannot see the "ECOVACS_xxxx" Wi-Fi, reboot Robot (press and hold the Reset button until a startup sound is played) and the router; then force quit the app and try again

  • Make sure the connected home Wi-Fi network is a 2.4GHz or 2.4/5GHz mixed network.
  • Make sure that the robot is in an area with good Wi-Fi coverage. We recommend using the robot within 3 meters of the scope of your home Wi-Fi.

Error code: 10503 - Timed out while receiving network setup info
Please keep your phone connected to the "ECOVACS_xxxx" Wi-Fi before the progress bar exceeds 50%.

Error code: 3 - Login timed out
Please log in to your account and try again.
